description:
At Cranwell & Moore P.L.C. Attorneys at Law, our attorneys have 75 combined years of experience in a wide range of legal issues. Our Virginia law firm never forgets, however, that your case is the most important one to you. We strive to uphold the highest standards of personal and attentive client service while pursuing the most effective legal results.

Located just outside of Roanoke, our law firm represents individuals and families throughout Virginia, West Virginia, Tennessee and the surrounding areas of the Southeast United States. One of our most prominent areas of practice is personal injury. We handle car accidents, trucking accidents, motorcycle crashes, surgical negligence, FELA and railroad injuries, product liability, wrongful death and more.

Beyond personal injury matters, our dedicated and professional lawyers handle a spectrum of other cases. We have experience in Railroad Retirement Disability, eminent domain/inverse condemnation, pharmaceutical litigation, noncompetition agreements and breach of contract, and employment contracts.

When you need advocacy and counsel in any area of law, you can count on the law firm of Cranwell & Moore P.L.C. Attorneys at Law Schedule a free initial consultation with one of our lawyers by calling our office at 1-888-635-6304. We look forward to representing you.
